title: Final Destination
description: After narrowly avoiding a fatal plane explosion, a group of seemingly lucky teen classmates finds that Death is not so easily cheated.

title: Scary Movie
description: The Wayans brothers spoof some of Hollywood's biggest blockbusters, including Scream, I Know What You Did Last Summer, The Matrix and American Pie.

title: Scream 3
description: This installment of the tongue-in-cheek horror franchise finds Sidney Prescott once again battling a crazed killer – this time, on a movie set.

title: What Lies Beneath
description: When Claire Spencer starts hearing ghostly voices and seeing spooky images, her husband tries to reassure her by telling her it's all in her head.
